long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AbridgIt is a simple browser extension that makes it easy to summarize any long article you find on the web with a single click. When you visit any web page that has a lot of text, click on the AbridgIt browser extension and it will automatically summarize the text and show you the abridged version. AbridgIt uses modern artificial intelligence services such as Chat GPT along with our own custom intelligence to pull the important copy from a page, summarize it and quickly display it to the user.
